column7: You flatter me unnecessarily, dear Cousin. You need not strive to win my favor. Though, here, have something more, a gift from me to you.
Zagreus, you honor me again? I seem to be unable to deter you from entirely unnecessary gestures such as these. Though, at least I can reciprocate!
I've come to offer my support.
I'm here for you, dear Cousin.
Fight onward, Cousin, knowing I am at your side.
I wanted you to have this.
A token of my faith in you, dear Cousin.
I thought that you knew better.
Why choose this course of action?
You truly wish to anger me?
At present I would ask for privacy.
I have no wisdom to impart right now.
I commend you for your efforts.
What is the meaning of this?
Noble Cousin, you are going to get out of there. I'll see that all of us upon Olympus do our part, beginning with me now.
What is the meaning of this?
I trusted I could count on you.
No pleasing all upon Olympus, I suppose.
Very good. That is, for me, at least.
Perhaps next time you shall cooperate with me again.
Wound the pride of an Olympian, and pay the price.
Know that this could have been avoided, Zagreus.
You are untouchable for now, Cousin!
Just let them try and stop you!
I ought not help you thus!
You ask me now to aid you, is that so?!
Are you quite serious about this, Zagreus?!
